subtitle: Advanced Eye Area Rejuvenation
introduction: Master the art of eye detox treatments to address dark circles, puffiness, and signs of aging around the delicate eye area. This specialized course combines traditional techniques with modern innovations for exceptional results.

curriculum.name: Day 1: Eye Area Anatomy & Assessment
curriculum.description: Understanding delicate eye anatomy, common concerns, and professional assessment techniques

curriculum.name: Day 2: Advanced Treatment Protocols
curriculum.description: Hands-on training in detox techniques, lymphatic drainage, and rejuvenation methods with live practice
